results.abstract: The screening rooms were closed. The festivals were virtual. The blockbusters were in storage. Even so, our critics found abundant and inspiring signs of cinematic life in the pandemic.

results.byline: By Manohla Dargis and A.O. Scott
results.title: The 25 Greatest Actors of the 21st Century (So Far)
results.abstract: Chameleons or beauties, star turns or character roles — these are the performers who have outshone all others on the big screen in the last 20 years.
One day, we’ll look back on this year and bawl. But we should also remember that there were professionals out there who dared to bring joy to our screens.
results.title: Best Performances of 2020

results.title: Dave Prowse, Man Behind Darth Vader’s Mask, Is Dead at 85
results.abstract: Mr. Prowse went from being a weight lifting champion in Britain to helping portray one of the most memorable villains in movie history. But his voice did not make the edit.

results.title: Hollywood’s Obituary, the Sequel. Now Streaming.
results.abstract: In the 110-year history of the American film industry, never has so much upheaval arrived so quickly and on so many fronts.
